Title: Secure Text Box for Windows Forms
Description: A secure text box control that is implemented using SecureString for secure entering of passwords written in C#
HomeWiki:
Project Description

A secure text box control that is implemented using SecureString for secure entering of passwords written in C#

This control inherits from System.Windows.Forms.TextBox which makes it a snap to drop in-place to your current applications.
This control originates from http://weblogs.asp.net/pglavich/archive/2006/03/14/440191.aspx. I found it to be ridiculously buggy, so here is a new implementation which appears to work well!

Original License

"Do what you will with the control. I take responsibility for nothing :-) The source code is free for everyone to copy if they want. I dont care too much. Would be nice to know where its used though, thats about it."
- Glav, http://weblogs.asp.net/pglavich/archive/2006/03/14/440191.aspx#6806755
